title: Saguaro National Park: Professional Development
body: Education Ranger Corps        NPS       The park employs local teachers as Park Rangers to lead place-based experiences for young people and to help foster their personal connection to nature and the park. Tucson teachers are familiar with challenges education faces locally as well as barriers that prevent young people and their families from connecting with the park. Their experience as teachers and knowledge of the park will promote park relevance and will contribute to the preservation and protection of the park.         NPS  Park Contacts: Chip Littlefield  Saguaro National Park                                               (520) 733-5157 chip_littlefield@nps.gov    Saguaro National Park TRT Position Description - Environmental Education/ Interpretation
